thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Genuine Nice Service
thread.title_full: Genuine Nice Service - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: M S
title: Genuine Nice Service
text: From the outside staff to the inside staff, everyone makes an effort to meet all requests. Both outside and inside are continually staffed at the proper amount to ensure no waiting for help. I must give a shout out to Daisy at the Front Desk and Nathan outside. The two of them made my family's quick vacation to NYC a blast.
